# probounds.calculate_bounds_combined { #probounds.probounds.calculate_bounds_combined }

```python
probounds.calculate_bounds_combined(
    raw_data_observational,
    raw_data_experimental,
)
```

Combine observational and experimental datasets to compute bounds.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name                   | Type      | Description                                                       | Default    |
|------------------------|-----------|-------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| raw_data_observational | FrameLike | Observational dataset containing ``trt`` and ``outcome`` columns. | _required_ |
| raw_data_experimental  | FrameLike | Experimental dataset containing ``trt`` and ``outcome`` columns.  | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type               | Description                                  |
|--------|--------------------|----------------------------------------------|
|        | dict\[str, float\] | Combined lower and upper probability bounds. |
